trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows menu or toolbar command item.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item de comando de menu ou barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> class represents information about a Windows menu or toolbar command.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> classe representa informações sobre um comando de menu ou barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface allows you to add <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objects to the Visual Studio menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface permite que você adicione <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objetos para o menu do Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the following members:
trans-unit.target: Essa classe fornece os seguintes membros:

trans-unit.source: An event-handler property to which you can attach an event handler for the command.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de manipulador de eventos para o qual você pode anexar um manipulador de eventos para o comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> property that uniquely identifies the command.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> propriedade que identifica exclusivamente o comando.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A> method that executes the command.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A> método que executa o comando.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A> method that can be overridden to handle the event that occurs when a new command is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A> método que pode ser substituído para manipular o evento que ocorre quando um novo comando é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Boolean flag states that indicate whether the command is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Estados de sinalizador booliano que indicam se o comando é <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A>, ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A> property that indicates the OLE command status code for the command.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A> código de status para o comando de comando de propriedade que indica a OLE.

trans-unit.source: An override for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Uma substituição para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> object, configures its properties, and adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objeto, define suas propriedades e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the `Component1` class on your form and open the form in a design environment like Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma instância do `Component1` de classe do formulário e abrir o formulário em um ambiente de design como o Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Press the F1 key to invoke the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Pressione a tecla F1 para invocar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: The event to raise when the user selects the menu item or toolbar button.
trans-unit.target: O evento a ser gerado quando o usuário seleciona o botão de barra de ferramentas ou item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The unique command ID that links this menu command to the environment's menu.
trans-unit.target: A ID exclusiva do comando que vincula esse comando de menu ao menu do ambiente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> object, configures its properties, and adds it to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objeto, define suas propriedades e adiciona-o a um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is checked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se esse item de menu está marcado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o item está marcado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu command changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o comando de menu muda.

trans-unit.source: A command can change if it becomes checked or disabled.
trans-unit.target: Um comando pode alterar se ele se torna marcado ou desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> associated with this menu command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> associado a esse comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> associated with the menu command.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> associada com o comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this menu item is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este item de menu está disponível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o item estiver habilitado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> object, configures its properties, and adds it to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objeto, define suas propriedades e o adiciona à <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o comando.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o comando.

trans-unit.source: An optional argument for use by the command.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento opcional para uso pelo comando.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command with the given parameter.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o comando com o parâmetro especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method ignores <paramref name="arg" />, but deriving classes may override this method and use it.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão desse método ignora <paramref name="arg" />, mas derivando de classes pode substituir este método e usá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the OLE command status code for this menu item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código de status do comando OLE para este item de menu.

trans-unit.source: An integer containing a mixture of status flags that reflect the state of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que contém uma mistura de sinalizadores de status que refletem o estado do item de menu.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the public properties associated with the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as propriedades públicas associadas ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the public properties of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém as propriedades públicas do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: All menu commands store their public properties in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Todos os comandos de menu armazenam suas propriedades públicas de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Properties%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The key in the properties dictionary is the property name.
trans-unit.target: A chave no dicionário de propriedades é o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This allows for generic enumeration of properties and provides a consistent substrate from which new properties can be added without modifying the class definition.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite enumeração genérica de propriedades e fornece um substrato consistente do qual novas propriedades podem ser adicionadas sem modificar a definição de classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is supported.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se esse item de menu é compatível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is supported, which is the default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o item for compatível, o que é o padrão. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> object, configures its properties, and adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objeto, define suas propriedades e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this menu command.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação de cadeia de caracteres desse comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandID" /> property appended with the names of any flags that are set, separated by pipe bars (|).
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandID" /> anexada com os nomes de quaisquer sinalizadores definidos, separados por barras verticais (|).

trans-unit.source: These flag properties include <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked" />, <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled" />, <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported" />, and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible" />.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades de sinalizador incluem <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked" />, <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled" />, <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported" /> e <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se esse item de menu está visível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o item estiver visível; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> object, configures its properties, and adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objeto, define suas propriedades e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.
